body_html: When I train the faster-rcnn-resnet101 model with object-detection repo, no matter how many GPUs I used, the train.py will consume all of the GPUs. e.g. when I use 1, 2 or 4 GPUs, train.py occupy all the memory of them, but only one GPU 'Volatile GPU-Util ' is 100%, the others are 0%.
